rl.photoviewer.fx.view

Class ImageViewCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.photoviewer.fx.view.ImageViewCtrl

  • public class ImageViewCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller which is responsible for handling user events for an image pane. It provides functions like zooming and panning.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

      • zoom

        public void zoom(javafx.geometry.Point2D refPoint,
                 double newScale)
        Performs zooming. Image information at refPoint does not move on the screen.
        Parameters:
        refPoint - Mouse position in image coordinates
        newScale - Scale to be used next (might be modified during update to fit to layout constraints)
